languages.text: "Подтверждаю. Нахождение мирян на территории монастыря без благословения Претора Электроида будет расцениваться как богохульное нарушение священного протокола безопасности".
"Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."
languages.original_text: "Подтверждаю. Нахождение мирян на территории монастыря без благословения Претора Электроида будет расцениваться как богохульное нарушение священного протокола безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."
"Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

"Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

languages.text: "Bestätigt. Die Anwesenheit von Laien auf dem Klostergelände ohne den Segen des Praetor Elektros wird als frevelhafter Verstoß gegen das heilige Betriebsritual angesehen werden."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: "Bestätigt. Die Anwesenheit von Laien auf dem Klostergelände ohne den Segen des Praetor Elektros wird als frevelhafter Verstoß gegen das heilige Betriebsritual angesehen werden."

languages.text: « Affirmatif. La présence de profanes sur les terres du monastère sans la bénédiction du praetor Électroïde sera considérée comme une violation du très saint Rite d'Opération. »
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. La présence de profanes sur les terres du monastère sans la bénédiction du praetor Électroïde sera considérée comme une violation du très saint Rite d'Opération. »

languages.text: “已确认。所有未得到驭电执行官的许可的教外人士，若是出现在修道院内，将被视为对神圣操作仪典的亵渎。”
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: “已确认。所有未得到驭电执行官的许可的教外人士，若是出现在修道院内，将被视为对神圣操作仪典的亵渎。”

languages.text: 「確認した。電機人執行官の祝福なしに修道院の敷地内に一般人が立ち入ることは、神聖な任務の儀礼を冒涜する行為とみなされる」
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: 「確認した。電機人執行官の祝福なしに修道院の敷地内に一般人が立ち入ることは、神聖な任務の儀礼を冒涜する行為とみなされる」

languages.text: «Confirmado. La presencia de laicos en los terrenos del monasterio sin la bendición del Praetor Electroide será considerada como una violación sacrílega del santo Rito de la Operación».
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmado. La presencia de laicos en los terrenos del monasterio sin la bendición del Praetor Electroide será considerada como una violación sacrílega del santo Rito de la Operación».

languages.text: "Onaylıyorum. Avamın Praetor Elektroit'in kutsaması olmadan manastırda bulunması, kutsal Faaliyet Ayini'nin ihlali anlamına gelir ve kutsala hürmetsizlik olarak görülür."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. The presence of laypeople on monastery grounds without the Praetor Electroid's blessing will be regarded as a sacrilegious violation of the holy Rite of Operation."

traits.locale_text: "Onaylıyorum. Avamın Praetor Elektroit'in kutsaması olmadan manastırda bulunması, kutsal Faaliyet Ayini'nin ihlali anlamına gelir ve kâfirlik olarak değerlendirilir."
